train module¶

The train script is responsible to use the data that is prepared by the ingestData script and using it to train various machine learning models.

Parameters¶

TrainFolderstr

This accepts the name of the folder whose contents we want to train out models.

Trainfilestr

This accepts the name of the trainfile.

OutputFolderstr

This accepts the name of the output folder where the models are stored.

Log Levelstr

This accepts the log level for the logger.

Log Pathstr

This accepts the path to where the log files will be stored into.

No console logstr

This enables us to not output the logs in the console.

train.trainLinearModel(X, Y, fileName)[source]¶

Function enables us to train a Linear Regression model

X : dataframe Y : Series fileName : str

train.trainRandomForestRegressorGridSearch(X, Y, fileName)[source]¶

Function enables us to train a Random Forest Regression using Grid Search model.

X : dataframe Y : Series fileName : str

train.trainRandomForestRegressorRandomSearch(X, Y, fileName)[source]¶

Function enables us to train a random forest regressor model with random search.

X : dataframe Y : Series fileName : str

train.trainTreeRegressor(X, Y, fileName)[source]¶

Function enables us to train a Decision Tree Regression model

X : dataframe Y : Series fileName : str
